favourite.article: Oh, Lord I love You for all the things You are! Oh, Lord I love You for all the things You do! Oh, Lord I love You. Help me love You more, With all my heart, with all my soul, with all my mind.
Help me return to my first love and constrain me with Your love. Thank You for constraining me with Your love. Now because You loved me I can love You.
" Oh, Lord I love You. Help me love You more, "

I'm very impressed with this song. Thanks for sharing. We need more grace, truth and life so that I can love the Lord with all my heart. I can't do without the word of God added into myself so that our God can make home into my heart. Loving the Lord with all our heart is matter of rejecting our own fleshly desire worldly enjoyment. It means that we should deny ourself and giving God as first place into our heart whatever we do and decisions in life. The more we touch Lord in spirit in the word the more we love Him. No more self desire of loving worldly pleasure; He will become our all and all.: kindness, peace, love, mercy, all good virtues is in Christ Jesus who is the source of righteousness.
Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful. Amen, amen. Yes, yes...my favorite one.
The tune is nice and matches the lyrics.
To have faith in Him , You must love Him. If you feel as if your love is not strong enough, pray and ask God to change your heart. Amen!
Indeed, loving the Lord requires our entire being, our heart, soul and mind. We could not be halfway, we must be absolute in loving Him. May the Lord forgive us for our shortcomings. Amen.
I was very touched by this song when I first learned it :) Matthew 22:37 And He said to him, "You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind."
